text: aur main to apane baap daada ibaraaheem va isahaaq va yaaqoob ke mazahab par chalane vaala hoon munaasib nahin ki ham khuda ke saath kisee cheez ko (usaka) shareek banaen ye bhee khuda kee ek badee meharabaanee hai ham par bhee aur tamaam logon par magar bahutere log usaka shukriya (bhee) ada nahin karate
